text.sentence: I know this is a long way off, but I have a great idea for you for Mother's Day (it'll work for Father's Day too).?
Get a webcam and microphone,?and?download a copy of Microsoft NetMeeting to your computer.?
I will see to it that?
Mom and Dad will be?similarly equipped.?
See where I'm going with this??
Mom and Dad will be able to talk to you and see you.?
Let me know what you think.
